additional_buffs.description: [Raging Dash] will be activated even when Salamander Rider is in Time Shop. The effects stack at 0.25% for each 5-star, and 0.5% for each 6-star. (However, the effects of [Raging Dash] cannot exceed over 10%.)
additional_buffs.name: Raging Dash Limit Break

buffs.description: Increases the production speed of Human guild unit by 7% per 5-star unit, 15% per 6-star unit. Applies in Time Shop, but can not exceed 150%.
buffs.name: Senior Instructor (Human)

hidden_abilites: At its first appearance, it Increases the Attack speed and movement speed of all ally units, and casts a shield that temporarily Grants immunity against physical attacks.
Increases its movement speed by 9%, and its attack range by 10%.
Increases the attack range of all units by 7%, and the movement speed of all units by 9%.
Significantly increases attack power and critical hit rate against enemy crystal.
Senior Instructor(Human) Limit Break : The production speed of Human Guild Units affected by the Senior Instructor(Human) increase up to 200%.

Raging Dash Limit Break : [Raging Dash] will be activated even when Salamander Rider is in Time Shop. The effects stack at 0.25% for each 5-star, and 0.5% for each 6-star. (However, the effects of [Raging Dash] cannot exceed over 10%.)
description.skill1: Increase attack speed of human unit in Guild Raid (1%, 2%, 4%, 6%, 8%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Salamander Rider ]
